TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Mahamadou_Issoufou, title = Mahamadou_Issoufou, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mahamadou_Issoufou} }

S.FORM: Mahamadou Issoufou 4 bulad 7 demiad, Mahamadou Issoufou, u misingkiway. 1951 a mihca nalecuhan) u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Niger ayza sa ci Mahamadou Issoufou, micakat a demiad sa i 2011 a mihca 4 bulad 7 demiad.

Mahamadoo Issoofoo 4 bolad 7 demiad, Mahamadoo Issoofoo, o misingkiway. 1951 a mihca nalecohan) o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) no Niger ayza sa ci Mahamadoo Issoofoo, micakat a demiad sa i 2011 a mihca 4 bolad 7 demiad.
